channel.title: Client Problems
channel.description:
Ok I've tried about 20 different clients and I have gotten this problem and its frustrating because I can see client in the folder so I dont know whats up :| If someone would be kind enough to help me I'd be very grateful.
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Client Problems
item.dc:creator: @hamza hamza
item.description:
@hamza wrote:

Do you got Path and Classpath at envirement settings? that was my problem

Read full topic

item.title: Client Problems
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

You didn’t add the cache in the correct directory.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Problems
item.dc:creator: @Knightraider Knightraider
item.description:
@Knightraider wrote:

Ok I finally got the server and client to work now I get error_Game_j5sio Ive read some articles and put my cache508 folder in and its made sub folders rs2 and rs2_folder IM using Umairs source and his full screen client his server console produces connection recieved from 127.0.0.1 and yes i ran the server before the client… I also checked the Signlink and the cache is pointed right and it still wont work Im currently using java 6u7

Read full topic

Extract the client and run it.

i mean, does it have client.java?
